import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import Form from "../Components/form" import Modal from "../Components/modal" import { createAgency , getAllAgents,deleteAgency} from "../Repositories/agencyRepos" const Agency = () => { const agencyForm = [ { name: "name", type: "text", label: "Agency Name", id: 'agency_name' }, ] const [agents,setAgents] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ allAgency() },[]) const allAgency = async()=>{ let data = await getAllAgents() setAgents(data) console.log(data) } const addAgent = async(data) =>{ console.log(data) await createAgency(data) allAgency() } const deleteAgent = async(id) =>{ await deleteAgency(id) } return (
} />
